snippet.title: Phineas and Ferb: Across the 2nd Dimension - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Get a look at the new game Phineas and Ferb: Across the 2nd Dimension and see all kinds of crazy gameplay modes you can expect.

IGN's YouTube is just a taste of our content. Get more:
http://www.ign.com

Want this week's top videos? Sign up:
http://go.ign.com/VideoRound-up
